commit message: Finish `StatsActivity` when the user dismisses the Jetpack Dialog by pressing the back button.
Drop the AsyncTask - HandleMediaSelectionTask, it could cause a lot of troubles in many places
Move the addMediaFile logic in an AsyncTask, only WPEditImageSpan construction now lives in a background thread

Updates the p/div conversion regex to more strictly match tags

- Avoids the p tag check matching progress tags, which causes issues when opening posts with failed images
Move the margin settings up of one level in the UI hierarchy.
